monogr.title: An ansvver to the Ievvish part of Mr Selden's History of tithes. By Stephen Nettles, B. of Divinity
monogr.author: Nettles, Stephen

div.head: Let the absence of the Author from the Presse, and the difficulty of the character of the written Copie, excuse these faults to the curteous Reader, which are thus to be corrected.

Ezra 8. p. 96. l. 9. for Iebamoth cap. 2. r. Iebamoth cap. 9. p. 77. l. 27. omittuntur haec verba; and some the second and third tithe one: Sequitur, which last opinion. Et haec omittuntur p. 84. l. 8: Iarchi giues not jointly the second tithe to the Leuite stranger, &c: but expresly and seuerally the first tithe to the Leuite, and the poore mans tithe to the stranger, fatherlesse, and widow: Sequitur And this testimony, &c: p. 98. l. 12. for 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 , r. 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 . p. 102. l. 2. for 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 , r. 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 p. 102. l. 14. for 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 , r. 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 . p. 102. l. 14. for 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 , r. 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 . p. 102. l. 15. for 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 , r. 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 . p. 105. l. 29. for 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 , r. 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 . p. 107. l. 14. for quae, r. quia. p. 107, l. 30. for 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 , r. 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 . p. 108. l. 31. for the first part, r. the fift part. p. 109. l. 4. for first part, r. fift part. p. 113. l. 1. for 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 , r. 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 . p. 113. l. 11. for 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 , r. 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 . p. 120. l. 6. for 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 , r. 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 . p. 120. l. 8. for 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 , r. 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 . p. 122. l. 13. 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 , r. 〈 in non-Latin alphabet 〉 . p. 125. l. 7. for Geofayle, r.
